overview: Georgia Jones, the hot substitute teacher, catches Bobbi Dylan showing Emily Willis proof of where she's seen her before -- in a sexy online video! Mrs Jones starts unbuttoning her shirt, showing off her tits. The girls are unable to do or say anything, as they stare at Georgia's glorious breasts. After agreeing with her friend Nia Nacci that it's really hot, Gia Derza mischievously grins as she approaches the thermostat and ups the temperature instead of turning it down. The only thing that she wants right now is to get naked with her friend in her bedroom. Chloe Cherry is hesitant at playing spin-the-bottle, admitting to her friend, Jane Wilde, that she is the only person she's ever kissed before. Jane tells her to relax and enjoy their college experience.
title: Playing the Innocent Girl
